All press releases

Become a member

The Scottish Council for Voluntary Organisations (SCVO) is the national membership organisation for the voluntary sector.

Along with our community of 2,240 members, we believe that charities, social enterprises and voluntary groups make Scotland a better place.

By joining SCVO you can become part of a movement that is dedicated to achieving the ambitions of Scotland’s voluntary sector.

SCVO membership also gives you access to vital support services that can help your group or organisation run smoothly.

SCVO membership

#NeverMoreNeeded

We are exploring how the voluntary sector has responded and continues to respond to coronavirus through a series of articles and discussions, and we are collating content from across the sector that tells this story.

Scottish Charity Awards

Friday 25th September 2020

Now in its 14th year, the Scottish Charity Awards highlight the best, most innovative and effective charity organisations and individuals from the past year, and celebrate those who make a difference in our communities.

Find out more

#EUareValued

We believe every person who works to make a difference to Scottish communities should be valued, and that includes our colleagues who have come from other EU countries to live and work here. Scotland’s voluntary sector is strengthened thanks to their contribution.
